sentences.en: Chan has been known to blase about his Hollywood work.
sentences.cn: 众所周知,成龙已经对他的好莱坞工作心生厌倦.

sentences.en: Ein Dinosaurier, dessen Absterben jetzt zusammentrifft mitdem Platzender virtuellen Blase.
sentences.cn: 这就像一头恐龙,现在它的灭绝与虚拟泡沫的幻灭同时发生着.

sentences.en: The drinkers also seem more blase than ever about the consequences.
sentences.cn: 而他们似乎对后果也更加地漠不关心.

sentences.en: The film star is blase about endless flattery now.
sentences.cn: 那位电影明星现在对无休无止的吹捧已经厌烦了.

sentences.en: The pop star is blase about money now.
sentences.cn: 那位流行歌星现在对钱已经厌烦了.

sentences.en: They are blase about their driving skills.
sentences.cn: 他们对自己的车技充满信心，以致漫不经心。

sentences.en: Your blase attitude gives your students an erroneous impression of the joys of scholarship.
sentences.cn: 你那厌世的态度将会令学生对学问的乐趣产生一种错误的理解.
